relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Campus police are always alert! Tickets are on widows every morning.
Residential life has something for students to do every weekend. They also have tons of clubs and activities during the week.

On Campus there is the cafeteria and Lions Den. The cafeteria isn't horrible and isn't the best, but it's a place where you make tons of new friends and enjoy a break from studying. The Lions Den is a fun place where you can grab something to drink or have a meal with you man...very yummy.
Dorm life is a very big part of SAGU! Dorms are always active in decorating and competing for different titles. You defiantly don't want to miss dorm life!
Very intense on studying. I'm an education major and everything is done with excellence. Very Intense.
Prepare yourself for a ton of fun! Buy your books from Amazon. & make your college experience what you want it to be.

I Love Southwestern Assemblies of God University. If you're looking for a college where the staff treats you like family, fellow students pray for you in high and low times, and the friends you will make last a life time.
pageTitle: Southwestern Assemblies of God University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {175653=SAGU is an amazing, innovative university; there is so much potential in that small little school! We have an amazing music program and the digital media arts program has just exploded! We just filmed our first feature length film in 2014, and it's going to be awesome!, 110336=Currently, there are two dining options on campus: the caf, and the grille. There are a lot of options daily for what you want to eat and it is really nice, especially when you have to eat there every day! The grille also serves Starbucks and really good smoothies. Fall 2013 there will be an Einstein Bagels available in the new state of the art communications building!, 181501=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck The University is expensive. However, there is student loans, grants, and financial aid for students. Along with school scholarships. Am enjoying being here I enjoy being on oncampus classes. I learn better on campus. People are friendly and helpful. Am learning a lot Southwestern Assemblies of God University is a great Christian Faith based University. I am majoring in Children and Family Ministries and I have learned so much in the past year from my professors and also have been involved in outreach opportunities that minister to children in the area. I live off campus as a graduate student, however I have been able to have on-campus classes in which I have met wonderful people in the classrooms and around the campus. The campus is located in Waxahachie, Texas which is a calm city where a student can live with the enough resources around them such as grocery stores, clothing stores, restaurants, and so much more. The university also has chapel weekly where students during the day go to hear a sermon and worship God. These chapel times have been a great spiritual experience outside the classroom in getting to know more about God. Campus days are also offered for students who are looking for colleges to
